episodes.title: Donus
episodes.plot: The crew come back to Kirecburnu. Things have changed in their absence. They want to make everything like they used to be.

episodes.title: Yeni Hayat
episodes.plot: Mecnun decides to make big changes in his life. He wants to get a job and earn money.

episodes.title: Kabullenis
episodes.plot: Mecnun starts working in Omer's store. He meets Hidayet.

episodes.title: Seviyorum Be Abi!
episodes.plot: Mecnun is in depression because he thinks that Leyla loves someone else. Erdal Bakkal is angry because no one goes to his store anymore.

episodes.title: Hukuk
episodes.plot: Hidayet is in jail. Mecnun wants to save him in order to impress Leyla.

episodes.title: Vay Be
episodes.plot: Mecnun tries to get close with Leyla but he fails every time. Erdal Bakkal buys a car.

episodes.title: Her Giden Biraz Degisir
episodes.plot: Pakize comes back from Germany. No one recognizes her but Iskender.

episodes.title: Is Adami
episodes.plot: There are some misunderstandings in the neighborhood. Ismail Abi finds a new job.

episodes.title: Kelepce
episodes.plot: Leyla is sick of the troubles that Mecnun causes. She goes to court for this situation and Mecnun gets a punishment. He has to wear an electronic handcuff which gives him a shock if he is around Leyla.

episodes.title: Vicdan
episodes.plot: There is a voice that can be heard from all around the world and scientists think it comes from Istanbul. Scientists go to Istanbul in order to find out the source of the voice.

episodes.title: Zaman
episodes.plot: Mecnun wants to know Leyla better so, he travels through time in order to see her past.

episodes.title: Dilek Tasi
episodes.plot: Azsakalli Dede is about to die. The crew want to find his family but they find something else. They find a map in a wooden box which shows the place of a wish-stone.

episodes.title: Mecnun ve Is
episodes.plot: Mecnun and Ismail Abi find a new job. Yavuz meets a new thief.

episodes.title: Rusya
episodes.plot: Mecnun and Leyla are engaged but Benjamin and Hidayet have another plan.

episodes.title: Arabesk
episodes.plot: Arabesque is forbidden in the country. Benjamin and Arda's father produce a new drug and start selling it to people. This drug makes people believe in memories that never happened and give them a fake happiness.

episodes.title: Zengin Sinif
episodes.plot: Leyla and Mecnun start spending time with rich people while Yavuz is getting close with the new thief.

episodes.title: Orhanlar
episodes.plot: Leyla's company is about to bankrupt. They decide to organize a concert of Orhan Gencebay and hope to make a lot of money with this concert.

episodes.title: Kirecburnu Cakallari
episodes.plot: Erdal Bakkal creates a website for his store. The crew want to find money for Leyla's company.

episodes.title: Gecmis
episodes.plot: Erdal Bakkal has weird nightmares. Iskender and Omer are threatened by their past. Mecnun hears voices in his head.

episodes.title: Market
episodes.plot: There is a big hurricane that is coming to Istanbul.

episodes.title: Ayrilik Korkusu
episodes.plot: Leyla and Mecnun have nightmares for breaking up with each other. Yavuz discovers something about his past.

episodes.title: Efsaneler
episodes.plot: Hidayet kidnaps Leyla to a magical place where it can be traveled both to a place and through time by mirrors. Mecnun thinks he can save her with the mirror of King Arthur and he starts searching it.

episodes.title: Ã–lÃ¼m
episodes.plot: The Death comes to Kirecburnu and he wants to take someone's life before he leaves. The crew have to choose who will die.

episodes.title: Nigde
episodes.plot: Leyla and Omer move to Nigde. Mecnun wants to find her address but he can't. Finally, he decides to make spiritual journey in order to find her.

episodes.title: MelÃ¼l'Ã¼n Yolu
episodes.plot: Melul suddenly dies and everyone thinks that this is a murder. The crew try to find the murderer.

episodes.title: I. Metonya meydan muharebesi
episodes.plot: Metin stays in Iskender's house and he makes problems for everyone. He doesn't let anyone sleep in the nights and he drinks a lot. Iskender wants to get Metonya back in order to get rid of Metin.

episodes.title: Yavuz'un Vedasi
episodes.plot: Yavuz gets shot by an arrow. He is in coma. The crew look for someone who can save him.

episodes.title: Dosto Asik Olursa
episodes.plot: Dosto goes out every night. He doesn't write anymore. He meets a woman in a pub and feels in love. The tree on Omer's head grows.

episodes.title: Yoklugunda
episodes.plot: Mecnun forgets Leyla's birthday. He wants to find a meaningful present for his apology.

episodes.title: Makine
episodes.plot: Erdal Bakkal finds a machine under his house. This machine says that the end of the world is coming and the crew only have twenty four hours to stop it.

episodes.title: Gelecek
episodes.plot: Leyla and Mecnun find themselves in 4000 after the machine explodes. The crew travel to future in order to find them but they go to wrong year. They are in 3000. In both years, there is a man called the shadow who controls the world.

episodes.title: Anne
episodes.plot: Iskender has a heart attack. Mecnun starts driving taxi instead of his dad. He meets a mysterious old woman.

episodes.title: Sans
episodes.plot: Hidayet's mother and Hidayet start living together. There is a girl in the neighborhood and she doesn't speak at all. She just smiles and brings luck to person she is smiling to.

episodes.title: Fedakarlik
episodes.plot: Iskender loses his house because of his debts. They can't find anywhere to stay so they go to a park. Erdal Bakkal steals Dosto's laptop. Hidayet's mother try to know Leyla better.

episodes.title: Seviyorsan Ãœzme, Sevmiyorsan Oynama
episodes.plot: Erdal, Yavuz and Metin are in madhouse. They escape from there and start rebellion against sanity and its supporters. Leyla finds a job but she gets fired because of Mecnun. Iskender is sick and tired of troubles Mecnun makes for Leyla.

episodes.title: Kill Bilal
episodes.plot: Mecnun breaks up with Leyla and he wants to find a new girlfriend in order to forget her. Erdal Bakkal continues his rebellion against sanity. Hidayet's mother chases a man called Bilal.

episodes.title: Tom Waits
episodes.plot: Hidayet is in coma. The doctor tries everything to save him. Leyla makes a big deal with a company. If she can organize a concert of Tom Waits, she will get lots of money and this means she can save her own company.

episodes.title: Kahramanlik
episodes.plot: Mecnun thinks that Leyla woos Hidayet because everyone believes Hidayet is a hero. Mecnun wants to prove that he is hero too and he saved the world before. Arda's father has some bad plans to take control of the world.

episodes.title: KireÃ§burnu'nun 100. Kurtulus Yili
episodes.plot: Hidayet is in coma again. The doctor needs papers from a century ago to heal Hidayet. Menun travels back in time in order to get these papers from the doctor's grandfather before he destroys them.

episodes.title: Para Kazanmak
episodes.plot: Mecnun thinks that nobody respects him. He talks about this situation with Metin and he decides to get a job and listen Metin's advice. Suna is chased by her past.

episodes.title: Falci
episodes.plot: Leyla and Mecnun have some concerns about the future of their relationship. They want to know if they will still be together in the future. They travel to future separately to find the answer. Leyla is shocked by what she saw.

episodes.title: Giden DÃ¶ner mi?
episodes.plot: Leyla and Mecnun decide to go to another place to make a new start. Yavuz and Eylul are getting married. Gotik Leyla meets someone. A surprise is on the way for Erdal Bakkal.

episodes.title: Bir Hikayeyi Sonlandirmak, Bir Hikayeyi Baslatmaktan Daha Zordur
episodes.plot: We take a look at the times right after Leyla's death. Mecnun doesn't speak at all. Yavuz tries to hold on to life in the jail. Erdal Bakkal makes plans for a short vacation with his family.
